mapper.insert: insert into pg_stat_all_tables (relid, schemaname, relname, seq_scan, seq_tup_read, idx_scan, idx_tup_fetch, n_tup_ins, n_tup_upd, n_tup_del, n_tup_hot_upd, n_live_tup, n_dead_tup, n_mod_since_analyze, last_vacuum, last_autovacuum, last_analyze, last_autoanalyze, vacuum_count, autovacuum_count, analyze_count, autoanalyze_count) values (#{relid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{schemaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seqScan,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{seqTupRead,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{idxScan,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{idxTupFetch,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nTupIns,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nTupUpd,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nTupDel,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nTupHotUpd,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nLiveTup,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nDeadTup,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nModSinceAnalyze,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastVacuum,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastAutovacuum,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastAnalyze,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastAutoanalyze,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vacuumCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{autovacuumCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{analyzeCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{autoanalyzeCount,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select relid, schemaname, relname, seq_scan, seq_tup_read, idx_scan, idx_tup_fetch, n_tup_ins, n_tup_upd, n_tup_del, n_tup_hot_upd, n_live_tup, n_dead_tup, n_mod_since_analyze, last_vacuum, last_autovacuum, last_analyze, last_autoanalyze, vacuum_count, autovacuum_count, analyze_count, autoanalyze_count from pg_stat_all_tables
